Operative Clause

title: 1. Limitless is an Add-on which is operative only with an active HDFC ERGO Retail Health Base
sample_text:
Policy. Base Policy/Plan or Base Product means the HDFC ERGO Retail Health Insurance 
policy/plan or product to which this add-on is attached.

title: 3. This Add-on can be opted by paying an additional premium only at the time of inception or
sample_text: at the time of renewing the Base Policy.

title: 4. This add-on shall be opted on all or none basis. Member level selection is not allowed while
sample_text: opting the add-on.

title: 5. If the members in the base policy are covered on an Individual basis then, this Add-on shall
sample_text: function on an Individual basis.

title: 6. If the members in the base policy are covered on a Family Floater basis then, this Add-on
sample_text: shall function on floater basis.

title: 7. If the members in the base policy are covered on a Multi-Individual basis then, this Add-on
sample_text: shall function on Multi-Individual basis.

title: 9. Geographical scope of coverage for this add-on shall be restricted to India only. Claims
sample_text:
payable outside India shall not be considered under this add-on. In cases where the base 
policy has Global coverage and this add-on is in force even then claims under this add-on 
shall be admissible for treatments taken in India only.

title: 10. All other general terms & conditions, exclusions, clauses, eligibility rules, and definitions
sample_text:

in this document or on the Policy Schedule of the Base Policy.

title: 11. In case policyholder wants to opt out of this add-on, he can do so only at the time of

title: 12. In cases where we have paid a claim under this Add-on, no refund shall be payable in case

sample_text:
